raw_comment: Is why Washington state and Oregon have early blooming months, because of the rain in those regions and because even during the rain there is sun
ace_sentences: Washington state has early blooming months.
During the rain in Washington state, there is sun.
During the rain in Oregon, there is sun.
The rain in Washington state causes early blooming months in Washington state.
The rain in Oregon causes early blooming months in Oregon.
The sun during the rain in Washington state causes early blooming months in Washington state.
The sun during the rain in Oregon causes early blooming months in Oregon.
